mapper.insert: insert into comment_tb values( seq_comment_tb_cmt_idx.nextVal, #{cmt_content}, #{cmt_ip}, sysdate, #{b_idx}, #{mem_idx}, #{mem_id}, #{mem_name} )
mapper.select: select * from comment_tb where b_idx = #{b_idx} order by cmt_idx desc
select * from ( select rank() over (order by cmt_idx desc) as no, c.* from (select * from comment_tb where b_idx=#{b_idx}) c ) where no between #{start} and #{end}
select nvl(count(*),0) from comment_tb where b_idx=#{b_idx}
